TryHackMe | Pickle Rick CTF

July 13, 2020

Hello Guys! Today we are doing the Pickle Rick CTF on TryHackMe.com. This Rick and Morty themed challenge requires you to exploit a webserver to find 3 ingredients that will help Rick make his potion to transform himself back into a human from a pickle.

URL: Pickle-Rick

Difficulty: Easy

Author: TryHackMe
